channel.title: Combat arms
channel.description:
Anyone play combat arms? I think it would be an awesome game if it wasn't for all the hackers and glitches.
Thoughts?

item.title: Combat arms
item.dc:creator: @drubrkletern drubrkletern
item.description:
@drubrkletern wrote:

[quote=“Fails, post:7, topic:465727”][quote author=drubrkletern link=topic=571854.msg4137878#msg4137878 date=1351867084]
It was pretty fun when I played lol

Too bad I sold my account, else I would still play :o
[/quote]
How much did you sell your account for? I did the same!

I must say, it was a pretty decent game, minus the ‘hackers’ and such. Exploits suck.[/quote]
I honestly forgot lol

Read full topic

item.title: Combat arms
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

I’ve played it off and on since 2010.

I only play one map.

Kill creek as a sniper. I find it really fun, problem is I get kicked by super mods or whatever sometimes because they think I’m hacking. Ohwell. Usually after that happens a few times I quit for a few weeks.

Read full topic

item.title: Combat arms
item.dc:creator: @Tutorial Tutorial
item.description:
@Tutorial wrote:

I used to play it all the time, but I quit because of all the hacks.

Read full topic

I must say, it was a pretty decent game, minus the ‘hackers’ and such. Exploits suck.[/quote]
When I play i don’t play in public rooms, I always play with friends in a private lobby. Which is why I enjoy it so much.

item.title: Combat arms
item.dc:creator: @Team_Rocket Team_Rocket
item.description:
@Team_Rocket wrote:

Yes, I’ve played it. The only reason I played was to manipulate the game and cheat. Then everything became public and people stopped caring, so I stopped playing. I cheat and ‘hack’ on pretty much every Online First-Person Shooter. It’s not a very good game and the Designers/Developers are all in it for the money; not one person at the Nexon studio sincerely cares about this game (which shows to people who know what they’re doing).

Read full topic

item.title: Combat arms
item.dc:creator: @The_Un-Named The Un-Named
item.description:
@The_Un-Named wrote:

I can’t remember if the game was called combat arms but I played a game with a similar name back in 2009 odd and it had one of the worse game engines I’ve seen, on a bad pc you could press the print screen button while running into a wall and no-clip through it and there was no server side protection against it

Read full topic
